AlarmRuleBlock.ContinuousTriggerThresholdTip: The alarm will only be triggered when the trigger conditions are met for as many times as the consecutive checks and evaluations are performed
AlarmRuleBlock.SilenceCycleTip: If the alarm does not return to normal after the alarm occurs, how often should the alarm notification be sent repeatedly?
